Package com.hexaware.dao

Class EmployeeServiceDao

java.lang.Object
com.hexaware.dao.EmployeeServiceDao
public class EmployeeServiceDao extends Object
Data Access Object (DAO) class for managing employee data in the database.

  • Method Details

    • GetEmployeeById

      public Employee GetEmployeeById(int employeeId)
      Retrieves an employee from the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Employee object representing the retrieved employee, or null if the employee is not found.

    • GetAllEmployees

      public ArrayList<Employee> GetAllEmployees()
      Retrieves all employees from the database.
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Employee objects representing all employees in the database, or null if no employees are found.

    • AddEmployee

      public void AddEmployee(Employee employeeData)
      Adds a new employee to the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeData - The Employee object representing the employee to be added.

    • UpdateEmployee

      public Employee UpdateEmployee(Employee employeeData)
      Updates an existing employee in the database.
      Parameters:
      employeeData - The Employee object representing the updated employee data.
      Returns:
      The updated Employee object if the update is successful, otherwise null.

    • RemoveEmployee

      public void RemoveEmployee(int employeeId)
      Removes an employee from the database by their ID.
      Parameters:
      employeeId - The ID of the employee to be removed.
